process.name: Change identity permissions
process.documentation:
Workflow for approve change of permissions (for applicant/identity) by given role request.
Input variables: - entityEvent: event with IdmRoleRequestDto
Configuration properties: - idm.sec.core.wf.approval.helpdesk.enabled: If is "false", then process will be not do approving by helpdesk - idm.sec.core.wf.approval.helpdesk.role: Role using for find candidates (approve by Helpdesk department) - idm.sec.core.wf.approval.manager.enabled: If is "false", then process will be not do approving by manager - idm.sec.core.wf.approval.usermanager.enabled: If is "false", then process will be not do approving by user manager - idm.sec.core.wf.approval.usermanager.role: Role using for find candidates (approve by User manage department) - idm.sec.core.wf.approval.security.enabled: If is "false", then process will be not do approving by security - idm.sec.core.wf.approval.security.role: Role using for find candidates (approve by Security department) - idm.sec.core.wf.approval.incompatibility.enabled=true (by default) - idm.sec.core.wf.approval.incompatibility.role=Incompatibility (default role for approval of role incompatibilities)

scriptTask.name: Loading concepts for add new permissions
Loading concepts for change permissions
Loading concepts for remove assigned permissions
Set request to approved
Set request and concepts to disapproved
Find all helpdesk identities and resolve if we can skip next task
Find all applicant's managers and resolve if we can skip next task
Find all user managers and resolve if we can skip next task
Set request and concepts to canceled by applicant
Find all identities with security role and resolve if we can skip next task
Send notification with result (Success)
scriptTask.documentation: Send notification with template with result

scriptTask.name: Send notification with result (Disapproved)
Send notification with result (Return)
Send notification with result (Return)
Send notification with result (Return)
Find all identities for approving a incompatibilities and resolve if we can skip next task
Find incompatibilities in approved roles
